title: Student Grades Dictionary
description: Create a program that takes a dictionary of student names and their respective grades as input. The program should then calculate the average grade and print out the student names with their grades, along with the average grade. If a student's grade is above the average, mark it as 'Above Average', if it's below the average, mark it as 'Below Average', and if it's equal to the average, mark it as 'Average'.
sample_output:
John: 85 - Below Average
Alice: 90 - Above Average
Bob: 78 - Below Average
Average Grade: 84.33
